Author: Rivka90
Text: Hey, me too. I backed out of the whole thing yesterday with a lie and to be honest, I think I'm having a much better time chilling with my cat than I would if I was running around trying to cook a ton of food for a bunch of people and the weird way it all just amounts to people stuffing their faces together in camaraderie for about 20 minutes. Now Christmas, on the other hand...
